title: Tomato Growing Secrets
content: Plant tomatoes deeper than they come in the pot - roots will form along the buried stem for stronger plants.
author: Emma Greenfield

title: Natural Pest Control
content: Mix 1 tbsp dish soap + 1 quart water to spray on aphids. Reapply after rain.
author: Carlos Rivera

title: Compost Accelerator
content: Add coffee grounds to your compost pile - they're rich in nitrogen and help break down materials faster.
author: Priya Patel

title: Watering Wisdom
content: Water plants in the early morning to reduce evaporation and prevent fungal diseases.
author: James Wilson

title: Small Space Herbs
content: Grow basil, mint, and thyme in hanging baskets to save space and deter ground pests.
author: Aisha Johnson

title: Flower Pruning Trick
content: Deadhead spent blooms weekly to encourage more flowers throughout the season.
author: Thomas Lee

title: Seed Saving Basics
content: Let heirloom plants go to seed, then store in paper envelopes labeled with date/variety.
author: Sophia Chen
